description: Detects the creation of a file with an uncommon extension in an Office application startup folder
author: frack113
Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
false_positives: Other legitimate extensions used by either excel or word
name: Uncommon File Created In Office Startup Folder
query: ((((((file.path:/.*\\\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\\\\[Ww][Oo][Rr][Dd]\\\\[Ss][Tt][Aa][Rr][Tt][Uu][Pp].*/) OR ((file.path:/.*\\\\[Oo][Ff][Ff][Ii][Cc][Ee].*/ AND file.path:/.*\\\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm]\ [Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss].*/ AND file.path:/.*\\\\[Ss][Tt][Aa][Rr][Tt][Uu][Pp].*/))) AND (NOT file.path:(/.*\.[Dd][Oo][Cc][Bb]/ OR /.*\.[Dd][Oo][Cc][Mm]/ OR /.*\.[Dd][Oo][Cc][Xx]/ OR /.*\.[Dd][Oo][Tt][Mm]/ OR /.*\.[Pp][Dd][Ff]/ OR /.*\.[Ww][Ll][Ll]/ OR /.*\.[Ww][Ww][Ll]/)))) OR ((((file.path:/.*\\\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\\\\[Ee][Xx][Cc][Ee][Ll]\\\\[Xx][Ll][Ss][Tt][Aa][Rr][Tt].*/) OR ((file.path:/.*\\\\[Oo][Ff][Ff][Ii][Cc][Ee].*/ AND file.path:/.*\\\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm]\ [Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss].*/ AND file.path:/.*\\\\[Xx][Ll][Ss][Tt][Aa][Rr][Tt].*/))) AND (NOT file.path:(/.*\.[Xx][Ll][Ss]/ OR /.*\.[Xx][Ll][Ss][Mm]/ OR /.*\.[Xx][Ll][Ss][Xx]/ OR /.*\.[Xx][Ll][Tt]/ OR /.*\.[Xx][Ll][Tt][Mm]/ OR /.*\.[Xx][Ll][Ll]/ OR /.*\.[Xx][Ll][Ww]/))))) AND (NOT (((process.executable:/[Cc]\:\\\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm]\ [Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss]\\\\[Cc][Oo][Mm][Mm][Oo][Nn]\ [Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss]\\\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\ [Ss][Hh][Aa][Rr][Ee][Dd]\\\\[Cc][Ll][Ii][Cc][Kk][Tt][Oo][Rr][Uu][Nn]\\\\.*/ AND process.executable:/.*\\\\[Oo][Ff][Ff][Ii][Cc][Ee][Cc][Ll][Ii][Cc][Kk][Tt][Oo][Rr][Uu][Nn]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/)) OR ((process.executable:(/[Cc]\:\\\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm]\ [Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss]\\\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\ [Oo][Ff][Ff][Ii][Cc][Ee]\\\\.*/ OR /[Cc]\:\\\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm]\ [Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss]\ \([Xx]86\)\\\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\ [Oo][Ff][Ff][Ii][Cc][Ee]\\\\.*/) AND process.executable:(/.*\\\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Ww][Oo][Rr][Dd]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\\\[Ee][Xx][Cc][Ee][Ll]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/))))))
